name: Find Clarity - Daily Superfood Trio
about: What it is:A superfood-packed, three-step, daily skin health routine for clear, hydrated, and balanced skin with a plump, natural glow..Skin Type:Normal, Dry, Combination, and Oily.Skincare Concerns:Dryness, Dullness, and Uneven Texture.Highlighted Ingredients:- Superfoods - Kale and Spinach: Lightweight skin soothers that are rich in essential fatty acids, phytonutrients, and vitamin C and E for a visible glow..Ingredient Callouts:These products are vegan and cruelty-free..What Else You Need to Know:This superfood-packed, three-step is your daily skin ritual with Youth To The People’s bestselling Superfood Cleanser, Superfood Air-whip Moisturizer, and a full-size Superfood Skin Drip Serum. This trio cleanses, hydrates, and smooths for an all-over dewy glow. It’s your minimalist routine that packs a punch..This Set Contains:- 2 oz/ 60 mL Kale + Green Tea Spinach Vitamins Superfood Cleanser.Clinical Results:In a test of the Superfood Cleanser:.Clean at SephoraOur commitment to offering formulas that go beyond regulatory standards to avoid controversial ingredients without sacrificing effectiveness.
ingredients: -Superfoods - Kale and Spinach: Lightweight skin soothers that are rich in essential fatty acids, phytonutrients, and vitamin C and E for a visible glow. .-HA Spheres, Ceramides, Postbiotic Ferment: Hydrate and strengthen skin barrier to rapidly, visibly plump and smooth skin. .-Dandelion Root and 5% Niacinamide: Antioxidant powerhouses known to brighten uneven skin tone...Superfood Cleanser: .Aqua/Water/ Eau, Cocamidopropyl Hydroxysultaine, Sodium Cocoyl Glutamate, Polysorbate 20, Sorbeth-230 Tetraoleate, Citric Acid, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice Powder, Brassica Oleracea Acephala Leaf Extract, Camellia Sinensis Leaf Extract, Chamomilla Recutita Flower Extract/Matricaria Flower Extract, Gardenia Jasminoides Fruit Extract, Medicago Sativa Extract/Alfalfa Sorbitan Laurate, Hexyl Cinnamal, Ci 75810/ Chlorophyllin-Copper Complex, Ethylhexylglycerin, Phenoxyethanol, Sodium Benzoate, Parfum/Fragrance. ..Superfood Skin Drip Serum:.Aqua/Water/Eau, Glycerin, Please consult the packaging of the product purchased.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.Superfood Cleanser: .-Use twice daily in the morning and evening. .-Wet face first. Put one to two pumps of Superfood face cleanser into wet hands, rub together into a light lather, and massage into face and neck for 30 seconds to activate the cold-pressed antioxidants. .-Rinse, pat dry, and follow with moisturizer. .-In case of contact with eyes, rinse thoroughly. For external use only. ..Superfood Skin Drip Serum: .-After cleansing, apply one to two pumps to face and neck before your moisturizer for a no-makeup glow and added boost of radiance. .-Pat until absorbed. .-Best results if used 2x daily, day and night..-YTTP hack: Mix one to two drops with your favorite foundation for a dewy, natural finish..-In case of contact with eyes, rinse thoroughly. .-For external use only. ..Superfood Air-whip Moisture Cream:.-Apply a dime-size amount of moisturizer morning and night into the skin until it is fully absorbed..-YTTP hack: Doubles as a silicone-free face primer for the ultimate smooth base for even makeup application. Apply before makeup or mix with your foundation for a hydrating boost all day long...Recycling Instructions:.Superfood Cleanser:. -Take off the cap and dispose into its proper container..-Check your local recycling authority's guidelines to make sure you use the correct one..-Wash the glass jar thoroughly in hot soapy water..-Rinse, then dry. If you skip this step, containers may contaminate other materials in a mixed-waste stream, like paper..-Place in your recycling bin and voila—your glass jar can now be infinitely recycled...Superfood Air-whip Moisture Cream: .-Take off the cap and dispose into its proper container. Check your local recycling authority's guidelines to make sure you use the correct one..-Wash the glass jar thoroughly in hot soapy water, rinse, then dry. If you skip this step, containers may contaminate other materials in a mixed-waste stream, like paper..-Place in your recycling bin and voilà—your glass jar can now be infinitely recycled.
